trans-unit.source: Built on the .NET Framework, Windows PowerShell is a task-based command-line shell and scripting language; it is designed specifically for system administrators and power-users, to rapidly automate the administration of multiple operating systems (Linux, OSX, Unix, and Windows) and the processes related to the applications that run on those operating systems.
trans-unit.target: Built on the .NET Framework, Windows PowerShell is a task-based command-line shell and scripting language; it is designed specifically for system administrators and power-users, to rapidly automate the administration of multiple operating systems (Linux, OSX, Unix, and Windows) and the processes related to the applications that run on those operating systems.

trans-unit.source: PowerShell base source code is now available in GitHub and open to community contributions, see [PowerShell](https://github.com/powershell/powershell).
trans-unit.target: PowerShell base source code is now available in GitHub and open to community contributions, see [PowerShell](https://github.com/powershell/powershell).

trans-unit.source: You can start with the bits you need at [get PowerShell](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#get-powershell).
trans-unit.target: You can start with the bits you need at [get PowerShell](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell#get-powershell).

trans-unit.source: Or, perhaps, with a quick tour at [Getting Started](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/learning-powershell)
trans-unit.target: Or, perhaps, with a quick tour at [Getting Started](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/learning-powershell)

trans-unit.source: All links about PowerShell in GitHub will take you to GitHub.
trans-unit.target: All links about PowerShell in GitHub will take you to GitHub.

trans-unit.source: The documentation collection is organized around 4 main sections:
trans-unit.target: The documentation collection is organized around 4 main sections:

trans-unit.source: In this section you'll find all announcements about the product (version by version and release by release).
trans-unit.target: In this section you'll find all announcements about the product (version by version and release by release).

trans-unit.source: In this section you'll find all you need to know to install all versions of PowerShell, in all supported environments.
trans-unit.target: In this section you'll find all you need to know to install all versions of PowerShell, in all supported environments.

trans-unit.source: You will also find how to configure for: security, accessibility, remote access and management, workflows, and web access.
trans-unit.target: You will also find how to configure for: security, accessibility, remote access and management, workflows, and web access.

trans-unit.source: This section is for users new to PowerShell to get all the information needed to start using the product.
trans-unit.target: This section is for users new to PowerShell to get all the information needed to start using the product.

trans-unit.source: The [Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell](getting-started/Getting-Ready-to-Use-Windows-PowerShell.md) that explains the necessary steps needed to setup PowerShell to execute and try all code and command snippets presented in the 'Getting Started with PowerShell' section.
trans-unit.target: The [Getting Ready to Use Windows PowerShell](getting-started/Getting-Ready-to-Use-Windows-PowerShell.md) that explains the necessary steps needed to setup PowerShell to execute and try all code and command snippets presented in the 'Getting Started with PowerShell' section.

trans-unit.source: The [fundamental concepts](getting-started/fundamental-concepts.md) guide that explains what is PowerShell and the basic concepts needed to start using it.
trans-unit.target: The [fundamental concepts](getting-started/fundamental-concepts.md) guide that explains what is PowerShell and the basic concepts needed to start using it.

trans-unit.source: A series of '[understanding <concept>](getting-started/understanding-concepts-reference.md)' topics that cover the basics of PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: A series of '[understanding <concept>](getting-started/understanding-concepts-reference.md)' topics that cover the basics of PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: A series of '[basic cookbook for <usage>](getting-started/cookbooks/basic-cookbooks-reference.md)' topics that provide recipes to execute standard tasks around files, file system, registry, processes, services and similar day-to-day subjects.
trans-unit.target: A series of '[basic cookbook for <usage>](getting-started/cookbooks/basic-cookbooks-reference.md)' topics that provide recipes to execute standard tasks around files, file system, registry, processes, services and similar day-to-day subjects.

trans-unit.source: A curated guide to other sources for [learning PowerShell](getting-started/more-powershell-learning.md).
trans-unit.target: A curated guide to other sources for [learning PowerShell](getting-started/more-powershell-learning.md).

trans-unit.source: This section contains all reference material PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This section contains all reference material PowerShell.
